page.title: 05EVENTS AROUND WEST WRATTING
page.content: {Charity Event:-}A large village fete was held in West Wratting in August in aid of Leukaemia Research. Â£1,070 was raised, a huge amount for such a small village. It was widely supported and Radio Cambridge, our local radio station did a piece about it. {Annual Events:-}In West Wratting the local mothers get together at Christmas and organise a children's party in the village hall. Money is raised through the year via jumble sales etc. and this has been taking place for 30 years or more. The W.I. puts on a show and Christmas Dinner to entertain the over 60's. Again money is raised through the year in order to pay for it. {West Wickham:-}A pub was re-opened in 1985. For the first time in years the residents had somewhere they could meet regularly and mix socially.
